title: G major part writing - no secondary dom - inv 7th

content.question: Part-writing from Roman numerals Realize the following progression in four voices, following eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments. Use only quarter and half notes.

frqParts.text: Part-writing from Roman numerals Realize the following progression in four voices, following eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments. Use only quarter and half notes.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Complete a four-part harmonic progression based on the Roman numeral analysis provided.
